movies.title: Master Executioner
movies.plot: Set in an imaginary Central European town under Turkish control about 300 years ago, this film tells the story of two friends - fisherman Richardus (Stefan Kvietik) and executioner Emil (Vlado Muller). They are proud, defiant men, with Janosik blood flowing through their veins. Their inherent rebelliousness, manifesting itself daily in these times of Turkish subjugation, brings the two allies even closer together.

biography.bio: Vlado Müller was born on March 19, 1936 in Bratislava, Czechoslovakia. He was an actor, known for The Medal (1980), Obzalovany (1964) and Master Executioner (1966). He died on June 20, 1996 in Slovakia.
biography.name: Vlado Müller

biography.bio: Stefan Kvietik was born on May 10, 1934 in Dolné Plachtince, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor, known for The Boxer and Death (1963), The Millennial Bee (1983) and Entanglement (1977).
biography.name: Stefan Kvietik

biography.placeOfBirth: Horná Stubna, First Slovak Republic [now Slovakia]
biography.bio: Emília Vásáryová was born on May 18, 1942 in Horná Stubna, First Slovak Republic as Emilia Vasáryová. She is an actress, known for Up and Down (2004), Václav (2007) and Cosy Dens (1999).
biography.name: Emília Vásáryová

biography.bio: Peter Debnar was born on October 8, 1941 in Bratislava, Czechoslovakia. He was an actor, known for Sladké hry minulého léta (1970), Pacho, hybský zbojník (1976) and Albert (1985). He died on June 8, 2004 in Bratislava, Slovakia.
biography.name: Peter Debnar

biography.bio: Jozef Budský was born on June 11, 1911 in Prague, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor and director, known for Vlcie diery (1948), Sahin (1967) and Master Executioner (1966). He died on January 31, 1989 in Bratislava, Czechoslovakia.
biography.name: Jozef Budský

biography.bio: Zuzana Jariabková is an actress, known for Master Executioner (1966) and The Pickpockets (1967).
biography.name: Zuzana Jariabková

biography.placeOfBirth: Kremnica (Körmöcbánya), Hungary, Austria-Hungary [now Kremnica, Slovak Republic]
biography.bio: Olga Adamcíková was born on February 17, 1903 in Kremnica (Körmöcbánya), Hungary, Austria-Hungary as Olga Gontková. She was an actress, known for V piatok trinásteho (1954), Lazy sa pohli (1952) and Krotká (1969). She was married to Samuel Adamcík. She died on August 16, 1992 in Bratislava, Czechoslovakia.
biography.name: Olga Adamcíková

biography.bio: Eduard Bindas was born on January 3, 1926 in Strázske, Czechoslovakia. He was an actor, known for Statky zmatky (1973), Captain Dabac (1959) and Janosik (1963). He died on October 28, 2012 in Bratislava, Slovakia.
biography.name: Eduard Bindas

biography.bio: Daniel Michaelli was born on May 23, 1929 in Martin, Czechoslovakia. He was an actor, known for Master Executioner (1966), Rozdelení (1976) and Vivát, Benyovszky! (1975). He died on November 7, 1980 in Martin.
biography.name: Daniel Michaelli

biography.bio: Frantisek Dibarbora was born on November 19, 1916 in Preßburg, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for Skalní v ofsajde (1961), Pán a hvezdár (1960) and Posledná bosorka (1957). He died on September 4, 1987 in Bratislava, Czechoslovakia.
biography.name: Frantisek Dibarbora

biography.placeOfBirth: Kralova Lehota by Liptovský Mikulás, Austria-Hungary [now Slovakia]
biography.bio: Ondrej Jariabek was born on February 20, 1908 in Kralova Lehota by Liptovský Mikulás, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor and writer, known for V piatok trinásteho (1954), Zemianska cest (1958) and The Sad Princess (1968). He died on February 3, 1987 in Bratislava, Czechoslovakia.
biography.name: Ondrej Jariabek

biography.bio: Viera Casnochová is an actress, known for Master Executioner (1966) and Smrt prichádza v dazdi (1966).
biography.name: Viera Casnochová

biography.bio: Ivan Krivosudsky was born on March 1, 1927 in Bratislava, Czechoslovakia. He was an actor, known for Field Lilies (1972), An Epic About Conscience I-II (1979) and Brothers (1962). He died on December 4, 2010 in Trnava, Slovakia.
biography.name: Ivan Krivosudsky

biography.bio: Samuel Adamcík was born on July 23, 1904 in Bohunice, Levice, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for The Wooden Village (1955), The Mysterious Castle in the Carpathians (1981) and The Deserter and the Nomads (1968). He was married to Olga Adamcíková. He died on July 10, 1984 in Bratislava, Czechoslovakia.
biography.name: Samuel Adamcík

biography.bio: Jozef Adamovic was born on April 23, 1939 in Trnava, Slovakia. He was an actor, known for Vivát, Benyovszky! (1975), La belle au bois dormant (1990) and The Mill (1971). He was married to Bozidara Turzonovová. He died on August 2, 2013 in Kosice, Slovakia.
biography.name: Jozef Adamovic
